sent.orig: According to reports, in Shanghai and other coastal cities, Kara OK royalty rate has reached 90%.
sent.trans: 据介绍，在上海等沿海城市，卡拉OK版权费的收缴率已达90%以上。

sent.orig: Then there is the expression A-OK. This means everything is fine.
sent.trans: 之后出现了“A-OK”这一表达，意思是一切都很好。

sent.orig: It includes his magnum opus: GPT Abnormal and OK, Stock, which were stirring the whole country.
sent.trans: 本文重点分析了赵化南的石库门系列剧，包括其轰动全国的代表作品：《GPT不正常》《OK,股票》等戏剧。

sent.orig: Click 'OK' to the informational dialog that appears.
sent.trans: 单击显示出来的信息对话框上的'OK'。

sent.orig: Then enter your serial number [prepaid card and recharge card password] [submitted] to press OK.
sent.trans: 然后输入你的[充值卡序列号]和[充值卡密码]按[提交]就OK了。
